mac-client.title: MacOS Client
mac-client.desc: Compatible with MacOS v15.1 and above, the client supports local connection, remote access, and file backup functions.

win-client.title: Windows Client
win-client.desc: Compatible with Windows 7 and above, the client supports local connection, remote access, and file backup functions.

doc-card.title: Documents
doc-card.desc: This document demonstrates two other ways to connect to a Zima device within a complex network situation.

communtity-card.title: Community for Support
communtity-card.desc: Join a mutually supportive community where 3,000+ Zima users are eager to help and access a full range of Q&A around connection issues.

scanning-card.title: Scanning...
scanning-card.desc: Now scanning the LAN, please ensure your device is powered, and the network cable is connected. If the network environment is complicated, please try other connection methods.

error-card.title: NO DEVICE FOUND IN LAN
error-card.desc: For unknown reasons, no device is found. We recommend installing the client or clicking the support button below.

cookie-tip.text: By closing this message, you consent to Zima's use of cookies on this device in accordance with its cookies policy, unless you have disabled them through your browser settings.
